mapper.select: SELECT user_name userName, lv, user_mileage mileageAmount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_coupon WHERE user_code = #{userCode} ) couponCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wishlist WHERE user_code = #{userCode} ) wishCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_list WHERE user_code = #{userCode} ) orderCnt FROM user_info WHERE user_code = #{userCode}

SELECT ma_seq maSeq, ma_name maName, ma_zipcode maZipcode, ma_address1 maAddress1, ma_address2 maAddress2, ma_phone maPhone, ma_default maDefault FROM my_address WHERE user_code = #{userCode} ORDER BY ma_default DESC, ma_seq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE my_address SET ma_default = 0 WHERE user_code = #{userCode} AND ma_default = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_address VALUES(TO_NUMBER((select MAX(ma_seq) + 1 FROM my_address)), #{userCode}, #{maName}, #{maZipcode}, #{maAddress1}, #{maPhone}, #{maDefault}, #{maAddress2})
